template.name: h5meta
template.value: <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name='viewport' content='width=device-width,initial-scale=1.0,minimum-scale=1.0,maximum-scale=1.0,user-scalable=no'> <meta name='format-detection' content='telephone=no,email=no'> <meta name='renderer' content='webkit'> <meta name='apple-mobile-web-app-capable' content='yes'> <meta name='apple-mobile-web-app-status-bar-style' content='black'> <meta http-equiv='X-UA-Compatible' content='IE=Edge,chrome=1'>
